question:
Consider the following initiatives:
  1. E-NIVARAN
  2. e-Trans
  3. Project INSIGHT
Which of the above is/are directly related to the Income Tax Department?
explanation: E-Nivaran launched in August 2016 aims to fast-track taxpayer’s grievance redressal, ensuring early resolution by integrating all the online and physical grievances received by the Income Tax Department and keeping track of it until it reaches its logical conclusion. The Income Tax Department has initiated “Project Insight” on Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence (DW&BI) platform to strengthen the non-intrusive information-driven approach for improving compliance and effective utilization of information in all areas of tax administration. “e-Trans” web platform for e-bidding and e-reverse auction for Tariff Based Competitive Bidding (TBCB) in power transmission projects.
